name: Apocrypha (Svartskogen)
description:
Apocrypha is an ace combat-inspired 3D space shooter, featuring a wide array of ships and weaponry to choose from.

The game is under active development!
A free development demo is now available!

You can keep up to date about the game's development by following me on Twitter.

CONTROLS:
Mouse: Ship aim.
Left-click: Cannons.
Right-click: Missiles.
R: Switch targets.
WASDQE: Override Yaw, Roll and Pitch movement. (useful when using Left Alt).
Left Shift: Speed boost.
Left Ctrl: Aerobrakes.
Left Alt: Look around.
Esc: In-game menu.
